issue.title: Simbody crashes when attempting to use PID

content.raw: I hope this issue is solved soon. This bug keeps causing my simulation to crash after running for a few minutes even when I am not using PIDs. It's making Gazebo very unstable whenever it runs Simbody. So it's now just limited to PIDs. I suspect it might have something to do with the integration at forces, because it seems to crash when either a force is applied or a collision occurs.
